channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report X-2023100911
item.description:
Report X-2023100911

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-06
  • City: BINGHAMTON
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package found on load side wet and leaking from lid. package handler handling product got some of the product on themselves. upon discovery package was placed in hazmat bagged lined tote and taken to hazmat cage for further inspection/ processing. DescribePack: lid was loose/ possibly bad seal. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: upon discovery package was placed in hazmat bagged lined tote and taken to hazmat cage for further inspection/ processing.

item.title: Report X-2023100676
item.description:
Report X-2023100676

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-14T18:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-03
  • City: RENSSELAER
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During preload a package handler was unloading a trailer when he noticed the box was wet along the side. He informed his manager which contacted the hazmat team to inspect the box. After placing in a yellow hazmat drum to be processed inside the hazmat cage under ventilation. It was discovered that the caps were loose on 2 of the bottles. DescribePack: 2 caps were loose on the degreaser causing them to spill inside the box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: the box was placed in a yellow hazmat drum and placed under ventilation in the hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023100547
item.description:
Report X-2023100547

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-28
  • City: BUFFALO
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During Preload sort on 09/28/23, a Hazmat package inside delivery vehicle was discovered by driver to be damaged and leaking contents inside vehicle. Driver alerted ops manager who then called QA to inspect package. QA discovered a one gallon jug of Zep Industrial Purple Degreaser leaking contents from loose cap inside package DescribePack: Bottle of Zep Industrial Purple Degreaser leaking contents from loose cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA placed damaged package in a red plastic Fedex Ground Hazmat bin with plastic liner and staged in Hazmat cage on site. Leaking degreaser cleaned with absorbent and neutralizer powder
